name: WP Skype Live Chat
author: thinhbg59

sections.description: SKype Live Chat is a WordPress plugin allow put your Skype live chat box on your website, visitors can chat with you via it or APP, Website,.. Skype. This is easy way to support and keep contact with your customers
sections.installation:
1. Upload contents of the plugin zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit settings page: Settings -> Skype Live Chat
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload contents of the plugin zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit settings page: Settings -> Skype Live Chat
